channel.title: Notice on Blogger Bust
channel.description: Recent content in Notice on Blogger Bust

item.title: Broken links
item.description: What is going on? A while back I noticed that all of my cross post anchor links are broken. They no longer link to anchors within the post, but instead link to the post itself. I planned on resolving this quickly, but it turned out to be more involved then I had hopped. In order to resolve the issue I needed to first register as a contributor of GNU emacs which I discussed here.
